typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		salesDate as string,
		salesItems as string,
		country as string,
		quantity as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> source1
source1 split(isNull(toDate(salesDate,'dd-MMM-yyyy') )

,
	disjoint: false) ~> ConditionalSplit1@(errorrows, goodrows)
ConditionalSplit1@errorrows sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		salesDate as string,
		salesItems as string,
		country as string,
		quantity as integer
	),
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink1
ConditionalSplit1@goodrows sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		salesDate as string,
		salesItems as string,
		country as string,
		quantity as integer
	),
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink2
